oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Crazy Water Crystals Program #02
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Crazy Water Crystals program #02, sponsored by the Crazy Water Crystal company. Hosted by Bill Karn (name unconfirmed), with the Crazy Radio Gang, the Milo Twins, the Boys In Buckskin (including Elmer and Jake), Martha Jordan (real name Dorothy Martha), Ritchie, Sammy, and Doc.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Crazy Radio Gang; Martha Jordan; Milo Twins; Boys In Buckskin
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: [Unidentified musical excerpt, test band] -- [Unidentified radio drama excerpt, test band] -- Theme -- Opening statement (Bill Karn) -- Bill Karn introduces the Milo Twins -- Weary Lonesome Blues (Milo Twins) -- Crazy Water Crystals commercial (Bill Karn) -- Bill Karn introduces Sammy -- Cripple Creek (Sammy banjo) -- Bill Karn and Edwin Milo talk -- Bill Karn introduces Martha Jordan -- Tumbling Tumbleweeds (Martha Jordan) -- Crazy Water Crystals commercial (Bill Karn) -- Bill Karn introduces Ritchie -- Ragtime Annie (Ritchie fiddle) -- Bill Karn introduces the Boys In Buckskin -- Ragtime Cowboy Joe (Boys In Buckskin) -- Crazy Water Crystals offer (Bill Karn) -- Theme -- Closing statement (Bill Karn)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Milo Twins; Milo, Edwin, 1916-1965; Milo, Edward, 1916-1978; Boys In Buckskin (Musical group)
